self.name: messages.sendEncryptedFile
self.description: Sends a message with a file attachment to a secret chat
self.descriptionExcerpt: Sends a message with a file attachment to a secret chat

arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: Whether to send the file without triggering a notification

arguments.name: randomId
arguments.description: Unique client message ID necessary to prevent message resending

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: TL-serialization of DecryptedMessage type, encrypted with a key generated during chat initialization

throws.description: The MD5 checksums do not match
throws.name: MD5_CHECKSUM_INVALID

throws.description: A waiting call returned an error
throws.name: MSG_WAIT_FAILED
